numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that all listed sports have more players of color than head coaches of color.
2. In all listed sports, the percentage of head coaches of color ranges from 13% to 41%.
3. In all listed sports, the percentage of head coaches of color does not reach 50%.
4. Baseball is the only listed sport in which players of color are not a majority.
5. I wonder why players of color are not a majority in baseball.
6. In football, players of color are a majority.
7. In basketball, players of color are a majority.
8. In soccer, players of color are a majority.
9. I wonder what caused the difference in baseball.
10. I wonder whether the public presentation of baseball caused the difference.
11. This graph impacts our community positively.
12. The diversity among players can encourage other sports fans to play sports.
13. The diversity among players shows that in some sports people of color have an opportunity to be treated equally.
14. This graph impacts our community negatively.
15. The lack of diversity among head coaches shows that people of color might not have an opportunity to lead.
16. The lack of diversity among head coaches could reinforce stereotypical job types in society.
17. The title is: Colored individuals are not getting equal opportunities on both sides of the major sports leagues, study says.
